title: Pedro Almodóvar’s Personal “Pain and Glory”
text:
“My life makes its way into every film I make, but this is the most intimate representation of me, an extension of myself,” Pedro Almodóvar says of “Pain and Glory,” his film opening Oct. 4. In it, Antonio Banderas play a Spanish director who shares Mr. Almodóvar’s spiky hair, childhood memories, personal fears and even his back problems. The heroin habit and other dramatic details are solely the character’s.
